summary: Feature request to align TypeScript SDK's shutdown grace period behavior with Go/Python SDKs. The TS SDK's shutdown grace period currently measures time after activities are cancelled, but should also support measuring time between shutdown request and sending cancellation to activities.
userImpact: Users cannot configure worker shutdown behavior consistently across Temporal SDKs, making it harder to port code between languages.
resolutionDetails: Completed in PR #1072, implementing consistent shutdown grace period semantics across SDKs.
keyQuote: In Go / Python SDKs shutdown grace period refers to the time between shutdown being requested and sending cancellation to running activities.
